sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: TrueCircle respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal and emotional data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our app and services.

sections.title: Data We Collect
sections.content: We collect only the information you voluntarily provide, such as reflections, journal entries, emotions, or relationship details. No hidden tracking, third-party analytics, or advertisements are used within TrueCircle.

sections.title: How We Use Your Data
sections.content: Your data is used solely to provide emotional insights, personalized reflections, and AI-generated guidance. We do not sell, rent, or share your data with any third parties.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: All data is stored securely using end-to-end encryption. TrueCircle does not transmit or expose your emotional data to any external servers without your consent.

sections.title: Offline Mode
sections.content: TrueCircle works offline. Your data remains stored on your device and syncs only when you choose to connect online. You have full control over synchronization.

sections.title: Your Control
sections.content: You can edit or delete your reflections anytime. You can also clear your data cache and reset all entries from the app settings.

sections.title: Childrenâ€™s Privacy
sections.content: TrueCircle is designed for users above 13 years old. We do not knowingly collect or store information from children under this age.

sections.title: Policy Updates
sections.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to improve clarity or comply with legal requirements. The latest version will always be available within the app.

sections.title: Contact
sections.content: For privacy-related concerns, email us at privacy@truecircle.online or use the in-app Support tab.
